subject: Problem my SIMSONN wheel
description_text:
Hi, I'm writing to you because I'm having a problem with the SIMSONN I just
received. The two top rotary switches don't work as buttons, while the
bottom right rotary switch doesn't work at all, as if it were dead. All the
other buttons work fine.

conversations.body_text: Hi Fabio Napolitano,  The knob is not damaged. The 12-position knob on the right is used to control the functionality of the left knob. For example, when the left knob is rotated left or right, it corresponds to button 17 and button 18. However, if the right knob is rotated first, the output of the left knob will switch to button 19 and button 20. Please note that this feature needs to be tested in-game, as Windows can only display the first 32 buttons, while the game itself can correctly recognize and display all 40 buttons.Â
